description:
Hearts are aflutter and emotions run high as Junta`s "Mega-Playboy" DNA starts coming into its own. But while Ami, Tomoko, and even Karin struggle with their feelings, Junta`s made up his own mind. To express his true feelings, Junta plans to buy a present to give to the girl he loves. But who`s the lucky girl?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pour qui est le collier ? Tomoko.
ネックレスは誰に? 倫子
